This is my first post on RT but I just had to vent...

BOTTOM LINE: It is a SJW  themed nightmare dressed up with flashy effects. I expect that from Disney/Hollywood but even worse\, they seek to tear down the fabric of the very ethos underpinning of Star Wars and the Jedi. Sad.

WHAT has Disney done to my beloved Star Wars! I thought the blatant liberal-progressive undercurrent in A Force Awakens was bad but this time they didn't even bother trying to hide the Leftist social engineering message - "men\, wealth\, organized religion\, history\, honor\, tradition\, etc. BAD - women GOOD". 

Is it too much to ask that The Left in Hollywood leave us any American icons without tearing them down to be replaced with progressive propaganda? To quote Mark Hamill's remark regarding the degrading of his beloved character; "I pretty much fundamentally disagree with every choice you've made for this character."

Rian Johnson your writing is incoherent as it is disrespectful to the SW franchise. 

That said\, it was visually entertaining as always.
